keyword: how many calories in a chicken wingette
title: How Many Calories in a Chicken Wingette?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a chicken wingette, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Wingette?
assumptions: Roasted chicken wingette with skin (drumette or flat section, ~30g edible portion), no added sauces or breading.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, skin removal, and added ingredients. Check labels or use a tracker for precision.

quick_answer.text: A roasted chicken wingette provides about 90 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken wingette?
faqs.a: Approximately 90 kcal for one roasted wingette with skin.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a chicken wingette?
faqs.a: About 9 g protein per roasted wingette.

faqs.q: Are chicken wingettes high in fat?
faqs.a: They have around 6 g total fat, mostly from the skin; removing it lowers fat significantly.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in chicken wingettes?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”roasted is lower (~90 kcal); fried can add 50+ kcal from oil absorption.

faqs.q: How does a wingette compare to a full chicken wing?
faqs.a: A wingette is about half a full wing, so roughly 90 kcal vs. 180 kcal for a whole roasted wing with skin.
